edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron

Class LibraryAccountSystemTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.LibraryAccountSystemTest

  • public class LibraryAccountSystemTest
extends java.lang.Object
    The library account system test tests the login features of the library account system. It also ensures the system handles the patrons correctly.
    Author:
    Marcus

      • LibraryAccountSystemTest

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        The set up method instantiates the classes needed for the tests.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testLogin

        public void testLogin()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.login(java.lang.String, java.lang.String). The test login method checks the exceptions to make sure the system throws an exception if a user logs in while someone else is in. It also ensures the system denies access in the case of incorrect passwords.

      • testLogout

        public void testLogout()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.logout(). The test log out method ensures that when a patron logs out, the current patron is null. Without this change, the system could be compromised.

      • testGetCurrentPatron

        public void testGetCurrentPatron()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.getCurrentPatron(). The get current patron is one of the first methods tested. It is tested first because the system uses the current patron field in order to show the appropriate menu type.

      • testIsAdminLoggedIn

        public void testIsAdminLoggedIn()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.isAdminLoggedIn(). The test is admin log in method verifies the patron is logged in prior to adding / removing users. It's a simple boolean test.

      • testIsPatronLoggedIn

        public void testIsPatronLoggedIn()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.isPatronLoggedIn(). The test is patron logged in checks to see if a patron is set to the current patron. It's a simple boolean test.

      • testAddNewPatron

        public void testAddNewPatron()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.addNewPatron(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int). The test add new patron method checks to see if a patron can log in after the admin account has added him. This method also checks to see if the exception is thrown if the admin is not logged in.

      • testCancelAccount

        public void testCancelAccount()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.cancelAccount(java.lang.String). The test cancel account method adds and account, cancels it, and then attempts to log in with the cancelled account. If the log in fails, the patron was successfully removed. The test also tests the exception--the admin must be logged in in order to cancel an account.

      • testListAcounts

        public void testListAcounts()
        Test method for LibraryAccountSystem.listAcounts(). The test list accounts method should print an empty string if no users are registered. It should also print a user if one has been added.
